Financial Services

  • BetaEpsilon helps financial services companies to create & improve their decision process. Using our Model builder & decision optimizer tool, we can:
    • Build better models using cutting edge data science techniques to predict customer Risk & profitability
    • Improve customer underwriting strategy
    • Improve existing customer & collection strategies
    • Create real time fraud detection model & strategy
  • BetaEpsilon also helps financial services companies the simplest way to translate messy data into analytical insight and produce financial dashboards and reports. Using our Business insight tool, you can
    • Monitor cash flow, revenue, and expenses across the organization
    • Streamline your financial planning and balance sheet
    • Analyze risks and opportunities
    • Create reports,insight and alerts for monitoring your portfolio

E-Commerce & Retail:

  • Beta Epsilon use structured & unstructured data to get meaningful insights and transform them into business decisions.
    • Campaign optimization: Beta epsilon data analytics platform helps in optimizing campaigns using historical campaign data
    • Supply Chain Management: Beta Epsilon provides innovative & customized solutions to reduce Inventory, warehousing & transportation cost
    • Merchant/Customer Fraud Detection: Beta Epsilon creates predictive algorithm to prevent first party and 3rd party frauds on ecommerce websites
    • Price Analytics: Our platform allows E-Commerce & Retail players to set the right price for their goods by using the data of constantly changing pricing on millions of SKUs on a daily basis. We consider competition pricing and product demand for suggesting appropriate price
    • Recommender Systems: Beta Epsilon uses cutting edge machine learning algorithms to create world class recommendation engines. These recommendation engines can be used to offer personalized products & services to each customer
    • User Experience Analytics: Beta Epsilon can use historic data to decide the rank ordering of products for a particular search, what is the best landing page of a customer coming to the website. We also analyze data from customer service calls, emails and product reviews to improve the user experience
